Vestige lay inside of Tuscon all but inert, his energy pulse at an
extremely low level. His optics are dim his mouth hangs open and
slack. It is as if his spark has been snuffed out, erradicated. Then
Tuscon connected to him by port and flooded him with energies!

Vestige's optics brightened as his whole body began to glow while
inside the cab, much like the glow that Tuscon himself was radiating
in the other world. However where Tuscon's was a soft glow, this one
was like a cleansing fire, one that rushed out from Vestige's chest
and optics and erupted explosively into the room.

The larger female insectoid that had been approaching Tuscon was
knocked back and sent sprawling across the room, the other female
insectoids two hissed in anger and looked over at Tuscon. However
thier anger quickly became fear as the tendrils that had been holding
Tuscon at bay were suddenly burnt away.

Inside Tuscon's cab Vesige smiled as he sat up, looking as if many
years had been taken from his frame. If he looked old and decrepid
before, now he was looking much younger, more vibrant as he sat up
properly in Tuscon's chair, the reds and yellows of his armor
reflecting the fiery light from the room.

Meanwhile the two humanoid insectoids shifted into a spider/scorpion
mode and began to rush at Tuscon, even as behind them the figure on
the bed began to stir and shift.

(TAG)

Preston
